author: AirPano VR
description:
This 360 photo virtual tour. It has been shot in the period from 2012 till 2018.

Today we will embark on a journey through ten unique football stadiums in the world! 
Montjuic Stadium in Barcelona, Olympic Stadium in Athens, famous Maracana, Rio de Janeiro... Each of them makes football fans' hearts beat faster! Get ready for the breathtaking scale, history and beauty!

Music used in this clip: Accept the Challenge by MaxKoMusic | https://maxkomusic.com/
Music promoted by https://maxkomusic.com

title: 360 Virtual Tour №3. Football Stadiums of the World
